content.body: Just a heads up I'll likely not make the meeting tomorrow, but will be back next week
We did not convene. See you next week.

I added this to the agenda document, since we have been thinking about this rule at least twice:

> ### Agenda Rules
> - If 30 minutes before the start of the meeting the agenda is empty, the meeting is automatically canceled.
>   - _Adding topics to the agenda has a very low bar: a few words and a presenter are enough!_
content.formatted_body:
I added this to the agenda document, since we have been thinking about this rule at least twice:

Agenda Rules

  • If 30 minutes before the start of the meeting the agenda is empty, the meeting is automatically canceled.
    • Adding topics to the agenda has a very low bar: a few words and a presenter are enough!
